name: MIST COIL
description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Allies Yes Enemies No;
lore: A mysterious vapor from the Font of Avernus now infuses the breath of Abaddon, who releases it at will.

name: APHOTIC SHIELD
description:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, dispelling them and creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: The powers of the black mist rise to absorb attacks like the black mist absorbs light.

name: BORROWED TIME
description:
When activated, dispels you and all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding. What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.

name: APHOTIC SHIELD
description: 75% of absorbed damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

name: BORROWED TIME
description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 550 damage while within Mist Coil's cast range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.
lore: The most unnatural of all the gifts of the Font of Avernus, this power defies mortal understanding. What should hurt, instead heals; and what should kill gives strength anew.

name: ACID SPRAY
description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.
lore: Using traditional Alchemy from the Darkbrew family, Razzil concocts an acid that dissolves even the toughest metals.

name: UNSTABLE CONCOCTION
description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.
info: ABILITY:No Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: MAX STUN:1.7/2.2/2.7/3.2;MAX DAMAGE:150/220/290/360;EXPLOSION RADIUS:250;MOVE SPEED BONUS:4%/8%/12%/16%;
lore: A silver lining to the failure of turning a mountain into gold, this volatile solution has destructive potential.

name: CHEMICAL RAGE
description:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
modifiers: DURATION:30;BASE ATTACK TIME:1.2/1.1/1;BONUS HEALTH REGEN:60/90/120;BONUS MOVE SPEED:20/30/40;
lore: The brew Razzil gave to the Ogre during their prison bust has become a useful potion in the midst of combat.

name: BERSERK POTION
description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: After Razzil's great grandfather tested an early version of this potion on himself, a surviving family member immediately saw the profit potential.

name: COLD FEET
description: Places Death Rime Stacks on an enemy that can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point. If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Kaldr's presence draws those around him into a frozen void, threatening to lock them in an icy prison for eternity.

name: ICE VORTEX
description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that applies Death Rime Stacks and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.
lore: Frozen, caustic winds are at the whim of Kaldr, chilling the field of battle.

name: CHILLING TOUCH
description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range and heavy magic damage. Applies a Death Rime Stack that lasts for 3 seconds. Additionally applies a 100% slow for 0.7 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.

name: ICE BLAST
description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, gaining Death Rime Stacks and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.
modifiers: DAMAGE:250/325/400;PATH RADIUS:275;FROSTBITTEN DURATION:10/11/12;DEATH RIME STACKS:2;SHATTER HEALTH THRESHOLD:12%/13%/14%;COLD FEET AOE:0/0/0;
lore: Ice storms from ages past flow through Kaldr's frosty limbs, crashing into the world and turning its inhabitants into monuments to his eternal power.

name: ICE BLAST
description: Freezes enemies hit with the current level of Cold Feet for 50% of the duration.

name: CHILLING TOUCH
description: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by 40%.
lore: The Ancient Apparition's eternal knowledge brings a frigid enchantment to his attacks.

name: BLINK
description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

name: COUNTERSPELL
description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and reflects any targeted spells.
lore: With the proper focus, Anti-Mage turns innate resistance into calculated retaliation.

name: MANA VOID
description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: DAMAGE:0.8/0.95/1.1;STUN DURATION:0.3;RADIUS:500;MANA THIRST MAX ATTACK DAMAGE:0/0/0;
lore: After bringing enemies to their knees, Anti-Mage punishes them for their use of the arcane arts.

name: COUNTERSPELL ALLY
description: Counterspell Ally may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around an allied hero that blocks and reflects any targeted spells. Any time a spell is blocked by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally, an illusion of Anti-Mage will be created next to the enemy.
lore: The only magic that Anti-Mage will even barely tolerate... is friendship.

name: BLINK
description: After casting Blink, your next Mana Break within 5s burns an additional 20% max mana and prevents the target from regenerating or gaining mana for a short duration. This debuff is undispellable. Blink Cooldown reduced by 1s.
lore: In his encounter with the Dead Gods, Anti-Mage learned the value of being elusive.

name: FLUX
description: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, dealing damage over time and slowing the target. The damage is not applied if another enemy unit is near the target.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: DURATION:6;ALLY SEARCH RADIUS:225;DAMAGE PER SECOND:15/30/45/60;MOVEMENT SPEED SLOW:14%/21%/28%/35%;
lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

name: MAGNETIC FIELD
description: Arc Warden generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy. The magnetic field grants bonus attack speed and protects allied units within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.
modifiers: RADIUS:300;DURATION:4/5/6/7;ATTACK SPEED BONUS:30/60/90/120;EVASION BONUS:100%;RUNE PULL FORCE:0;RUNE PULL RADIUS:0/0/0/0;
lore: Time and space are of little consequence to one as old as Zet.

name: SPARK WRAITH
description: Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.
modifiers: SEARCH RADIUS:375;DURATION:16;MOVEMENT SLOW:100%;ACTIVATION DELAY:1.5;DAMAGE:100/170/240/310;WRAITH SPEED:550;SLOW DURATION:0.5/0.6/0.7/0.8;
lore: Lesser fragments of Zet's original self.

name: TEMPEST DOUBLE
description:
Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and special Tempest Double versions of his spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.

The Tempest Double loses its sense of self and fractures over time, becoming slower and less accurate.
modifiers: BOUNTY GOLD:180/240/300;DURATION:18/21/24;MAX MISS CHANCE:35%;MAX SELF SLOW:35%;
lore: Warped by the power of its peers, Arc Warden becomes what it despises most: disharmony.

name: SPARK WRAITH
description: When Spark Wraith activates, a secondary Spark Wraith will fuse to the next closest target that deals 80% damage. Increases Spark Wraith search radius.

name: FLUX
description: Flux silences when the target is alone, deals more damage, and lasts longer.
lore: An infinitesimal fraction of the power which imprisoned the Ancients.

name: BERSERKER'S CALL
description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
lore: Mogul Khan's warcry taunts opponents into engaging in an unconquerable battle with the Axe.

name: BATTLE HUNGER
description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Ordinary heroes cannot withstand Mogul Khan's rage for battle, such that it injures them until it is satisfied.

name: COUNTER HELIX
description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
modifiers: DAMAGE:100/120/140/160;RADIUS:275;ATTACKS TO HELIX:7/6/5/4;DEBUFF DURATION:0;ATTACK DAMAGE REDUCTION:0%;MAX STACKS:0;
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

name: CULLING BLADE
description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed and armor.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: DAMAGE:275/375/475;KILL MOVE SPEED BONUS:20%/25%/30%;KILL ARMOR BONUS:10/15/20;KILL BUFF DURATION:6;KILL BUFF RADIUS:900;
lore: Mogul Khan is the embodiment of battle and fury, launching into a gruesome fatality against those who dare engage the Axe in combat.

name: BERSERKER'S CALL
description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units.

name: COUNTER HELIX
description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown and its counter advances when Axe attacks.
lore: Axe is the only reinforcement this army needs.

name: ENFEEBLE
description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Each tendril of fear that Atropos weaves increases the vulnerability of his victims to arcane and unknown arts.

name: BRAIN SAP
description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: Atropos finds no greater pleasure than to harvest the fear he creates.

name: NIGHTMARE
description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack and damage Nightmared targets freely.
lore: A stolen prowess from the goddess Nyctasha is to put his prey into forever sleep.

name: FIEND'S GRIP
description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

name: BRAIN SAP
description: Reduces cooldown by 3. Causes Brain Sap to become a 550 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 30%.

name: FIEND'S GRIP
description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by 45. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take 200% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.
lore: Victims of Atropos are frequently torn apart by vivid conjurations of their own nightmares.

name: STICKY NAPALM
description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies. Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 20 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: STACKS PER CAST:2;DAMAGE PER STACK:2.5/5/7.5/10/10;RADIUS:375;DURATION:6;MOVEMENT SLOW:-0.75%/-1.5%/-2.25%/-3%/-3%;TURN RATE SLOW:-10%/-30%/-50%/-70%/-70%;APPLICATION DAMAGE:5/10/15/20/20;BUILDING DAMAGE:0%;
lore: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.

name: FLAMEBREAK
description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
modifiers: IMPACT DAMAGE:25/50/75/100;DAMAGE PER SECOND:25/30/35/40;BURN DURATION:2/3/4/5;RADIUS:400;KNOCKBACK DISTANCE:250;MOVEMENT SLOW:8%/16%/24%/32%;
lore: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.

name: FIREFLY
description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air. The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.
modifiers: DAMAGE PER SECOND:25/50/75/100;RADIUS:250;DURATION:15;MAX MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS:0%/0%/0%/0%;MAX SPELL AMPLIFICATION BONUS:0%;MAX HEALTH AS DAMAGE PER SECOND:0%;
lore: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive. Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.

name: FLAMING LASSO
description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities. Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.

name: STICKY NAPALM
description:
Sticky Napalm no longer has a stack limit.

Sticky Napalm deals damage to structures.

name: FLAMING LASSO
description: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 650 units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.
lore: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.

name: WILD AXES
description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path. Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: CAST RANGE:1500;DAMAGE PER AXE:35/65/95/125;DEBUFF DURATION:12;DAMAGE AMP PER STACK:6%/8%/10%/12%;
lore: While learning to maneuver in nature alone, the Beastmaster also mastered the use of a pair of tomahawks, adept at cutting down trees as well as adversaries.

name: CALL OF THE WILD BOAR
description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.
modifiers: SUMMON DURATION:60;BOAR BASE HEALTH:300/450/600/750;BOAR ATTACK DAMAGE:25/40/55/70;BOAR SLOW:10%/18%/26%/34%;BOAR POISON DURATION:3;
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: CALL OF THE WILD HAWK
description: Beastmaster summons a hawk that circles around Beastmaster and dive-bombs at enemies with a base attack rate of every 4s, damaging and rooting them. Attack rate increases with the Hawk's attack speed. Prioritizes heroes.
modifiers: SUMMON DURATION:25;HAWK BASE HEALTH:200/325/450/625;HAWK BASE MAGIC RESISTANCE:30/40/50/60;DIVE DAMAGE:50/80/110/140;ROOT DURATION:0.25/0.5/0.75/1;
lore: After befriending the strange beast of his childhood, Beastmaster has learned to call to animals in times of need.

name: PRIMAL ROAR
description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40% movement speed for 2 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: STUN DURATION:3/3.5/4;DAMAGE:150/225/300;SHOUT WIDTH:300;MOVEMENT SLOW:-60%;ATTACK SLOW:-60;SLOW DURATION:3/3.5/4;
lore: The Beastmaster has learned to channel his primal instincts into an animalistic roar, causing devastation in the ranks of enemies.

name: CALL OF THE WILD HAWK
description: Increases Hawk duration by 5s and summons an additional Hawk.

name: BLOODRAGE
description: Drives Bloodseeker or an allied hero into a bloodthirsty rage which causes them to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of their health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: DURATION:8;ATTACK SPEED:60/90/120/150;SPELL AMPLIFICATION:15%/20%/25%/30%;MAX HEALTH DAMAGE PER SECOND:1.4%;BASE DAMAGE:0%/0%/0%/0%;
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

name: BLOOD RITE
description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
lore: The Flayed Twins are ever willing to aid those who spill blood upon the field of battle.

name: THIRST
description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 100%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.
modifiers: THIRST HEALTH THRESHOLD:100%;MAX THIRST MOVE SPEED:10%/20%/30%/40%;ACTIVE BONUS MOVE SPEED:0%/0%/0%/0%;ACTIVE DURATION:0;VISIBILITY HEALTH THRESHOLD:25%;
lore: Strygwyr becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

name: RUPTURE
description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: When the Bloodseeker hunts you, injuries become fatalities.

name: BLOODRAGE
description: Bloodseeker's Bloodrage attacks now deal 3% of the target's max health as Pure damage.
lore: Strygwyr shares his animalistic thirst for bloodshed.

name: SHURIKEN TOSS
description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed by 100% for 0.35s. The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200 radius of each other.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

name: JINADA
description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units and Buildings;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: Gondar's vast experience ensures he never walks away from a transaction empty-handed.

name: SHADOW WALK
description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability. If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.
lore: The court jesters present during King Goff's assassination can recount no other image than a dancing shadow.

name: TRACK
description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, increasing the damage they take and providing information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.
modifiers: DAMAGE AMPLIFICATION:8%/12%/16%;SELF BONUS GOLD:130/225/320;ALLIES BONUS GOLD:50/90/130;DURATION:25;SELF BONUS SPEED:12%/16%/20%;
lore: Using his elevated senses of sight and smell, Gondar's hits have quite a good chance of success.

name: FRIENDLY SHADOW
description: Applies Shadow Walk and all of its bonuses to the target ally. Allied fade time is 0.5s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Allies Yes Enemies No;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: Useful for the rare instances when a contested bounty is actually wanted alive.

name: SHURIKEN TOSS
description: Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.
lore: While the shuriken may be small, Gondar's precise aim can cause critical damage.

name: THUNDER CLAP
description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.
lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.

name: CINDER BREW
description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any Magic or Pure damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.
modifiers: DURATION:5;IGNITE TOTAL DAMAGE:80/160/240/320;MOVEMENT SLOW:24%/28%/32%/36%;RADIUS:400;BARREL SPEED:1600;BARREL IMPACT DAMAGE:0/0/0/0;
lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

name: PRIMAL SPLIT
description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
modifiers: DURATION:16/18/20;EARTH BREWLING HP:;1400 / 2300 / 3200STORM BREWLING HP;:1000/1500/2000;FIRE BREWLING HP:;1300 / 1450 / 1600VOID BREWLING HP;:1200/1500/1800;
lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.

name: PRIMAL SPLIT
description: Increases Primal Split duration and allows it to be cancelled early.

name: PRIMAL COMPANION
description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.

name: VISCOUS NASAL GOO
description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed for 5 seconds. Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.
modifiers: BASE ARMOR LOSS:1.5/2/2.5/3;ARMOR LOSS PER STACK:1.5/2/2.5/3;BASE MOVEMENT SLOW:10%;MOVE SLOW PER STACK:3%/6%/9%/12%;STACK LIMIT:4;
lore: Having caught a cold while stuck in the snow, Bristleback turns it to his advantage.

name: QUILL SPRAY
description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback. Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.
modifiers: RADIUS:700;QUILL BASE DAMAGE:25/45/65/85;QUILL STACK DAMAGE:30;STACK DURATION:14;MAX DAMAGE:500;
lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing. So can his quills.

name: WARPATH
description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.
modifiers: DAMAGE PER STACK:15/20/25;MOVEMENT PER STACK:2%/2.5%/3%;STACK DURATION:16/18/20;MAX STACKS:8/10/12;ACTIVE BONUS DAMAGE PER STACK:0%;ACTIVE BONUS MOVEMENT PER STACK:0%;DURATION:0/0/0;
lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided. But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.

name: HAIRBALL
description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies with Viscous Nasal Goo stacks and Quill Spray.
lore: Every part of Bristleback's body is a weapon -- even the parts he accidentally swallowed.

name: INSATIABLE HUNGER
description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.
lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.

name: SPIN WEB
description:
Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase and increases her Turn Rate, while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement.

Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.
modifiers: MAX SIMULTANEOUS WEBS:3/5/7/9;MOVESPEED BONUS:10%/22%/34%/46%;BONUS TURN RATE:0.2;ENEMY RESTORATION REDUCTION:0%/0%/0%/0%;
lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of foreboding.

name: SPAWN SPIDERLINGS
description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage and slowing them for 4 seconds. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat. The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.

name: INSATIABLE HUNGER
description: Increases duration. While Hunger is active, the bonus damage is increased by 4% every 1s.

name: SPINNER'S SNARE
description: Broodmother may create up to 5 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered. Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: FORMATION DELAY:2;ROOT DURATION:3;DAMAGE PER SECOND:100;WEB LINE WIDTH:900;
lore: The slightest tremor of her web is all Arachnia needs to find her prey.

name: HOOF STOMP
description: After a brief windup, Centaur Warrunner slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units. During the delay, he is disarmed but can move.
info: ABILITY:No Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: When the mighty hoof of the Warrunner touches soil, the tremors are felt far and wide.

name: DOUBLE EDGE
description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: DAMAGE:120/180/240/300;STRENGTH DAMAGE:60%/90%/120%/150%;BONUS STRENGTH:0%;STRENGTH DURATION:0;MOVEMENT SLOW:0%;SLOW DURATION:0;
lore: In the spurs of combat, Bradwarden's vicious strikes sometimes cause self-inflicted collateral damage.

name: STAMPEDE
description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.
info: ABILITY:No Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Allies Yes Enemies No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: STAMPEDE DURATION:3.5/4/4.5;STRENGTH MULTIPLIER DAMAGE:2/2.5/3;SLOW DURATION:3;TRAMPLE RADIUS:105;
lore: The great belt of Omexe, which labels Bradwarden as the greatest warrior of his kind, incites his fellow gladiators to follow him into barbarous combat.

name: DOUBLE EDGE
description: Causes Double Edge to slow enemy heroes and increase Centaur's strength per hero hit for a short time. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of 5 stacks.

name: WORK HORSE
description: Centaur hitches a cart behind him. While active, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede for the current level of Stampede, and can cast Hitch a Ride on a target ally.
lore: It is a great honor to be offered a ride by Centaur Warrunner and a grave mistake to refuse it.

name: CHAOS BOLT
description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: MINIMUM STUN:1.25/1.5/1.75/2;MAXIMUM STUN:1.75/2.25/2.75/3.25;MINIMUM DAMAGE:90/120/150/180;MAXIMUM DAMAGE:155/240/325/410;ILLUSION DURATION:0;ILLUSION DAMAGE REDUCTION:0%;
lore: Even Chaos Knight cannot predict this manifest of unholy energy.

name: REALITY RIFT
description: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6 seconds.
lore: Armageddon rides between the planes, bringing Chaos Knight to his victim wherever he may hide.

name: PHANTASM
description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are illusions that deal 100% damage, but take 350% damage.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
modifiers: NUMBER OF PHANTASMS:1/2/3;PHANTASM DURATION:30;PHANTASM DAMAGE:100%;PHANTASM DAMAGE TAKEN:350%;
lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.

name: CHAOS BOLT
description: Causes Chaos Bolt to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target. This illusion deals 15% less damage.

name: PHANTASM
description: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.
lore: Drawing on his battles fought across many worlds and many times, phantasms of the Chaos Knight rise up to quell all who oppose him.

name: PENITENCE
description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly. Chen can attack the Penitence target with bonus attack range.
modifiers: DURATION:5/6/7/8;MOVEMENT SLOW:-12%/-18%/-24%/-30%;BONUS ATTACK SPEED:20/40/60/80;SELF ATTACK RANGE BONUS:50/150/250/350;
lore: Although Chen's brand of animal enthrallment isn't quite strong enough to control the minds of enemy heroes, it still tests their resolve in combat.

name: HOLY PERSUASION
description: Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives a percentage of its bounty. Its maximum health is set to 400 + 50 per Chen Level. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.
modifiers: MAX UNITS:1/2/3/4;CREEP MAX LEVEL:3/4/5/6;HEALTH MINIMUM:400;PERCENTAGE OF BOUNTY:25%/50%/75%/100%;MOVE SPEED BONUS:5/10/20/30;BONUS DAMAGE:4/8/12/16;
lore: Although they may not be knights, Chen incorporates beasts into the Fold in the same way he himself was converted.

name: DIVINE FAVOR
description:
Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration. Can be cast on allies to provide them with bonus armor and increasing the healing and health regeneration they receive.

If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen receive the buff and will be teleported to him. Taking damage from enemy heroes or their units will cancel the teleport.
lore: Chen's zeal is infectious, blessing his allies with vitality and compelling them to his side.

name: HAND OF GOD
description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 10 seconds afterwards.
modifiers: INITIAL HEAL:200/300/400;HEAL PER SECOND:20/30/40;SHARD HOLY PERSUASION ANCIENTS:0;CHANNEL RADIUS:0;
lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

name: HOLY PERSUASION
description: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God's level. Additionally levels up some abilities of creeps by 1 level.

name: HAND OF GOD
description: Decreases the cooldown of Hand of God to 40s and it becomes a chanelled spell that lasts for up to 6 seconds. The initial heal happens at the start of the channel, and while channeling other nearby allied units become debuff immune with 60% magic resistance and the power of the heal over time is increased by 200%.
lore: Using the mental link with his thralls, Chen calls down restoration and well-being to those who share his fanaticism.

name: STRAFE
description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Skeleton Archers within a 1200 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 60% of the attack speed bonus.

Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units and Buildings;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: The closest Clinkz can come to peace is knowing that this was the last thing Maraxiform ever saw.

name: TAR BOMB
description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for 5 seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

When the Tar Bomb hits, any Skeleton Archers within attack range will attack the target. If autocast is activated, Clinkz will throw a tar bomb when attacking the target, if it is available.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units and Buildings;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: RADIUS:325;BONUS DAMAGE:15/25/35/45;AREA DURATION:5;MOVESPEED SLOW:-16%/-19%/-22%/-25%;SLOW DURATION:2.5;IMPACT DAMAGE:40/60/80/100;
lore: After his battle with Maraxiform, Clinkz found a useful source of ichor where his heart used to be.

name: DEATH PACT
description:
Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly Skeleton Archer and creates a Skeleton Archer in their place, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.

Only one archer can be summoned from Death Pact at a time.
modifiers: DURATION:45;BONUS HEALTH:175/250/325/400;CREEP MAX LEVEL:4/5/6/6;BASE CHARGE RESTORE TIME:40;
lore: Sutherex' bond of life and death has become a part of Clinkz, and his old bones are refreshed with repetition of the pact on lesser beings.

name: SKELETON WALK
description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Skeleton Archers.
lore: With a burst of fire and puff of smoke, the Bone Fletcher was nowhere to be seen.

name: BURNING BARRAGE
description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers, and dousing enemies with Tar Bomb slow.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: It's hard to say whether the blur around the Bone Fletcher is from his flaming heart or his speed with the quiver.

name: BURNING ARMY
description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.
lore: Existing on the brink of life and death, Clinkz has learned to temporarily bridge the gap between the two.

name: BATTERY ASSAULT
description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.
lore: Some of Rattletrap's contraptions don't quite work correctly, so detonating them proves useful as an offensive maneuver.

name: POWER COGS
description:
Forms a ring of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down. Damage is increased by 50% of the mana burned.

Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can push them up to 1000 distance away with one hit.
lore: One of Clockwerk's inventions of which he is most proud is the power cog - though it is sometimes despised by his allies.

name: ROCKET FLARE
description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for 6 seconds.
lore: What started as a festive display has become a useful scouting and bombardment tool.

name: HOOKSHOT
description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location. If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a 175 radius around the hit target. Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: COOLDOWN/MANACOST REFUND:0%;ALLY ARMOR DURATION:0;ALLY ARMOR BONUS:0/0/0;STUN DURATION:1.2/1.4/1.6;DAMAGE:75/175/275;
lore: A somewhat unwieldy device, the Hookshot sends the otherwise clunky Clockwerk armor flying through the air.

name: JETPACK
description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.
lore: Sure it's blown up over fourteen testing dummies, but at least they all flew!

name: OVERCLOCKING
description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in its range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased; Jetpack moves faster. Clockwerk's movement and attack speed becomes slowed to a crawl after the duration runs out.
modifiers: DURATION:13;COGS BONUS ATTACK SPEED:250;SELF SLOW DURATION:3;HOOKSHOT RADIUS BONUS:50%;HOOKSHOT DURATION BONUS:50%;BONUS ROCKET FLARES:2;ROCKET FLARE COOLDOWN:3;JETPACK SPEED:40%;
lore: Rattletrap understands the limitations of his armor. Just as he understands the risks of pushing past them in times of need.

name: CRYSTAL NOVA
description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement in the targeted area.
modifiers: RADIUS:425;MOVEMENT SLOW:-20%/-30%/-40%/-50%;ATTACK SLOW:-30/-45/-60/-75;SLOW DURATION:4;DAMAGE:110/160/210/260;PHYSICAL BARRIER AMOUNT:0/0/0/0;SELF PHYSICAL BARRIER AMOUNT:0/0/0/0;BARRIER DURATION:0;
lore: The air temperature around Rylai drops rapidly, chilling all around her to the core.

name: FROSTBITE
description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Deals 4x damage to non-ancient creeps.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Rylai channels winds from the Blueheart Glacier, imprisoning attackers in thick blocks of ice.

name: FREEZING FIELD
description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
modifiers: RADIUS:810;EXPLOSION RADIUS:320;MOVEMENT SLOW:-40%;ATTACK SLOW:-80/-120/-160;DAMAGE:110/180/250;CAST RANGE BONUS:0/0/0;AOE BONUS:0%/0%/0%;
lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

name: CRYSTAL CLONE
description: Slides in a direction, creating a crystal clone of herself in her place and disjointing incoming projectiles. If the clone takes enough damage or times out, it shatters, Frostbiting enemies in a 450 AoE around its place. The Clone can also be destroyed by Crystal Maiden's own spells.
lore: So convincing that some allies have spent minutes talking to the clone before they realized she wasn't speaking back.

name: FREEZING FIELD
description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 75% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by 20%. Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 3s.
lore: Once the place of her exile, Icewrack has become an anchor for Rylai's frigid onslaught.

name: VACUUM
description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Ish'Kafel modifies the center of gravity to a place of his choosing.

name: ION SHELL
description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.
lore: The Dark Seer slices holes into the 'Land Behind the Wall,' causing prismatic energy to seep forth.

name: SURGE
description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.
lore: Ish'Kafel once used his speed of mind to navigate the maze between the walls.

name: WALL OF REPLICA
description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows, damages, and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.
modifiers: WALL DURATION:30;REPLICA DAMAGE:70%/80%/90%;REPLICA DAMAGE TAKEN:200%;MOVEMENT SLOW:40%;SLOW DURATION:1;DAMAGE:25/40/55;
lore: The Dark Seer, while unable to return to his natural realm, can channel part of the prismatic wall with powerful strength of mind, sowing confusion amongst enemy ranks.

name: SURGE
description: Surged units leave behind a 150 radius trail that lasts 7s, slows enemies around it by 35% and deals 40 damage per second in 0.5s intervals. Can be put on alt-cast to disable the trail.

name: NORMAL PUNCH
description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3 seconds. Max power is reached after 1100 distance moved.
modifiers: MAX STUN DURATION:1.25;MAX KNOCKBACK DISTANCE:350;ILLUSION DURATION:6;MAX DAMAGE:400;
lore: As a young soldier, long before he became a leader of his people, Ish'Kafel was known amongst his fellow recruits as quite the pugilist.

name: BRAMBLE MAZE
description: Dark Willow creates a 500 AoE maze of 8 brambles that grow in the target area after 0.3 seconds. Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time. Lasts 12 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: LATCH ROOT DURATION:1/1.5/2/2.5;BRAMBLE LATCH RADIUS:90;DAMAGE PER TICK:50/55/60/65;
lore: The fae realm exists all around you, merely waiting to draw you in...

name: SHADOW REALM
description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable. Her next attack has 600 bonus attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3 seconds.
lore: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.

name: CURSED CROWN
description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.
lore: Didn't anyone ever tell you? Never strike a deal with a fairy...

name: BEDLAM
description: Dark Willow sends her pet wisp to roam around herself for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies. Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: You'll have to excuse my friend Jex. He's really into murder.

name: TERRORIZE
description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.
lore: You think you know the first thing about fear? Jex'll show you what that word truly means...

name: CURSED CROWN
description: Cursed Crown creates 4 brambles in a 175 radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Cursed Crown cooldown reduced by 1.5 seconds.

name: SHADOW REALM
description: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.
lore: What you can't see will most definitely hurt you.

name: STARBREAKER
description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
modifiers: COMBO DURATION:1.1;SWIPE/SMASH RADIUS:300;SWIPE/SMASH BONUS DAMAGE:25/40/55/70;SMASH STUN DURATION:0.6/0.8/1/1.2;BONUS ATTACK SPEED PER SWIPE:0/0/0/0;BONUS ATTACK SPEED PER SWIPE (ALLIES):0/0/0/0;
lore: Across the vast lineage of star progeny, there were multitudes unwilling to align with the aims of the Children of Light. To those who dared organize defiance, the Children would dispatch Valora and her hammer to show a measure of their power--to leave the rebels either shattered or set back to rights.

name: CELESTIAL HAMMER
description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for 2 seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.
modifiers: HAMMER DAMAGE:50/80/110/140;FIRE TRAIL DURATION:2.5/3/3.5/4;FIRE TRAIL RADIUS:200;FIRE TRAIL MOVEMENT SLOW:24%/28%/32%/36%;FIRE TRAIL BURN DPS:20/30/40/50;CAST RANGE:700/900/1100/1300;FIRE TRAIL MOVESPEED BONUS:0%/0%/0%/0%;
lore: The Brightmaul is Valora's oldest companion and sole remaining connection to the glow of her creators.

name: SOLAR GUARDIAN
description: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 350 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
modifiers: HEAL PER PULSE:45/70/95;LAND RADIUS:500;DAMAGE PER PULSE:30/50/70;LANDING DAMAGE:130/160/190;LANDING STUN DURATION:1.4/1.6/1.8;SCEPTER CHANNEL TIME:0;AIR TIME:0.8;
lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.

name: STARBREAKER
description: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by 35% down to a minimum of 215.

name: SOLAR GUARDIAN
description: Solar Guardian's aura now lingers for 3s after landing and follows Dawnbreaker around. Solar Guardian's heal per pulse is increased. Channel time and air time is reduced.
lore: Only in defense of an ally will Valora relent to call upon the last reserves of her old powers that still allow cosmic flight.

name: POISON TOUCH
description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: TARGETS:2/4/6/8;DAMAGE PER SECOND:16/28/40/52;SLOW:-16%/-18%/-20%/-22%;DURATION:3.5/5/6.5/8;BONUS SLOW PER HIT:-2%/-2.5%/-3%/-3.5%;SPLIT DAMAGE:0/0/0/0;
lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.

name: SHALLOW GRAVE
description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.
lore: Only a seasoned acolyte of the Shadow can properly perform the rite of preventing death.

name: SHADOW WAVE
description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby. Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
modifiers: HEAL ARC RADIUS:475;DAMAGE RADIUS:185;MAX HEAL TARGETS:4/5/6/7;DAMAGE:85/105/125/145;
lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.

name: NOTHL PROJECTION
description: Dazzle departs his body, traveling through the Nothl Realm as an invulnerable spirit that can cast spells, attack, and use items, leaving his body behind in the world with a visible tether. While active, Dazzle's basic abilities are empowered: Poison Touch hexes enemies, Shallow Grave heals upon expiration, and Shadow Wave has a shorter cooldown. The effect can be ended early, and Dazzle returns to the body at the end.
modifiers: MIN DURATION:5;MAX DURATION:12;HEX DURATION:1.4/1.6/1.8;SHALLOW GRAVE HEAL:225/300/375;SHADOW WAVE COOLDOWN REDUCTION:30%/40%/50%;HEALING AMPLIFICATION:0%;
lore: The allure of the Nothl Realm is intoxicating, but Dazzle never forgets his purpose for being there.

name: NOTHL PROJECTION
description: Nothl Projection can be cast while Dazzle is disabled. Increases healing done while in the Nothl Realm.

name: SHADOW WAVE
description: Shadow Wave can now target and bounce between enemies in addition to allies. When bouncing to an enemy, they will take damage and heal nearby allies equal to 100% of the normal healing and damage values. Dazzle will also perform an attack against any enemy that Shadow Wave bounces to.
lore: While it is a simplistic and routine rite among Shadow Priests, the Shadow Wave is also the most critical for success.

name: CRYPT SWARM
description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: Krobelus' many trips to the grave gather a flock of the damned.

name: SILENCE
description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
lore: Peering into the veil of her opponent's demise, Krobelus sees a silent future.

name: SPIRIT SIPHON
description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: Krobelus willingly shows others the path she alone cannot follow.

name: EXORCISM
description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 40 seconds.
Increases Death Prophet's movement speed while active.
modifiers: RADIUS:700;SPIRITS:10/17/24;HERO SPIRIT MIN DAMAGE:0/0/0;HERO SPIRIT MAX DAMAGE:0/0/0;LIFE DRAIN:25%;SPIRIT DAMAGE:64;SPIRIT BONUS DAMAGE:0%;ACTIVE MOVEMENT BONUS:4%/8%/12%;
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

name: SPIRIT SIPHON
description: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1 and causes enemies to be feared for 1 seconds if they are siphoned for 3 seconds consecutively.

name: EXORCISM
description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.
lore: Over time, the banshee remnants of her previous lives return to haunt the present.

name: THUNDER STRIKE
description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning. Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100% for 0.3 seconds. Provides vision of its target.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Disruptor's charged coils occasionally overload, and a singed armor plate or tuft of fur is the enemy's result.

name: GLIMPSE
description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago. Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage equal to a percentage of the distance glimpsed, that cannot go over a damage maximum.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: MIN DAMAGE:25;MAX DAMAGE:100/160/220/280;GLIMPSE DISTANCE TO DAMAGE:20%/25%/30%/35%;
lore: Playing with electricity can have unexpected results.

name: KINETIC FIELD
description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.
lore: The stryder is immune to the gale-force winds that will consume its adversaries.

name: STATIC STORM
description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration. The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.
lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

name: KINETIC FENCE
description: After a short formation time, creates a wall out of kinetic energy that enemies cannot pass.
lore: For a brief moment, it's as if the wind itself had turned solid.

name: THUNDER STRIKE
description: Increases the cast range and strike count of Thunder Strike. It can now also be ground targeted, where it will lie dormant for up to 4 seconds and attach to the first enemy that comes within the radius.

name: STATIC STORM
description: Mutes items.
lore: A summer squall in Druud is a hardship that only an Oglodi can survive.

name: DEVOUR
description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed. If alt-cast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.
modifiers: BONUS GOLD:35/70/105/140;CREEP MAX LEVEL:4/5/6/6;BASE CHARGE RESTORE TIME:0;
lore: Lucifer's appetite and greed are never sated.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.
lore: The Fallen One spreads destruction in his wake, sparing none from the flame which sustains him.

name: INFERNAL BLADE
description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: BASE BURN DAMAGE:15/30/45/60;MAX HP AS DAMAGE:1%/2%/3%/4%;BURN DURATION:4;STUN DURATION:0.6;
lore: Lucifer shares the fire branding bestowed upon him at the time of his exile.

name: DOOM
description:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy and prevents them from casting spells or healing in any way, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.

name: SCORCHED EARTH
description: Heals Doom and his controlled units for 60% of the damage value.

name: DOOM
description: Allies in a 350 radius around the doomed target also suffer the effects of Doom. Allows Doom to be self-cast to affect enemies around himself with Doom.
lore: When a name is tolled from the bell of Vashundol, doom is sure to follow.

name: BREATHE FIRE
description: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Knight Davion's breath has become that of the mighty Eldwurm Slyrak, remembered for burning numerous other knights to a crisp.

name: DRAGON TAIL
description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it and dealing damage. When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 450.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Davion's combination of dragon talents and knightly skills makes him a vicious opponent in melee combat.

name: ELDER DRAGON FORM
description: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons. Increases movement speed, attack damage, and Wyrm's Wrath effects. Attacks apply Wyrm's Wrath on-hit effects and a percentage of the attack damage to all enemies near the target. Increases Dragon Tail range. Increases health regeneration and armor bonuses from Dragon Blood.
modifiers: DURATION:60;BONUS MOVE SPEED:20;BONUS ATTACK RANGE:350;BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE:20/60/100/140;EFFECT SPLASH RADIUS:275;ATTACK DAMAGE SPLASH:30%/40%/50%/60%;WYRM'S WRATH BONUS:20%/30%/40%/50%;
lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

name: FIREBALL
description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
modifiers: RADIUS:275;DAMAGE PER SECOND:75;DURATION:8;LINGER DURATION:2;DRAGON FORM CAST RANGE:1400;MELEE CAST RANGE:600;
lore: Most Dragon Knights name no greater horror than the scourge of dragon's fire.

name: ELDER DRAGON FORM
description: Increases the level of Dragon Form by adding a Level 4 Black Dragon, that provides free pathing, increases damage, and increases effectiveness of the Wyrm's Wrath attacks.
lore: The dormant dragon power springs forth from within Davion, combining the powers of a legendary knight with a legendary Eldwurm.

name: FROST ARROWS
description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage. Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: MOVEMENT SLOW:-10%/-20%/-30%/-40%;BONUS DAMAGE:10/15/20/25;REGEN REDUCTION PER STACK:0%;BONUS DAMAGE PER STACK:0;STACK DURATION:0;BURST RADIUS:0;BURST DAMAGE PER STACK:0;BURST MOVEMENT SLOW:0%;BURST SLOW DURATION:0;MAX STACKS:0;
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

name: GUST
description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back and reveals invisible enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow.
lore: Traxex is rather fond of the tranquility of physical combat, calling on her Drow heritage to end the incantations of opposing magi.

name: MULTISHOT
description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.75 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
modifiers: WAVE COUNT:3;ARROWS PER WAVE:4;ARROW BASE DAMAGE BONUS:100%/120%/140%/160%;ARROW RANGE MULTIPLIER:1.75;MOVEMENT SPEED PENALTY:0%;
lore: In the ranger's youth, learning to fire multiple arrows at once was considered a distracting frivolity. In the war of the Ancients, such technique has become strange necessity.

name: GLACIER
description: Drow creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through except by Drow. Does not interrupt Multishot when cast.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: DURATION:8;ATTACK RANGE BONUS:200;BONUS ARROWS PER WAVE:1;
lore: Traxex wasn't just adopted by the Drow, she was adopted by the lands they lived in.

name: FROST ARROWS
description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.
lore: Ice-encased arrows pierce the silence, chilling their victims to the core.

name: BOULDER SMASH
description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a 200 radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits. If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units.
lore: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

name: ROLLING BOULDER
description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.6s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 60 + 100% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: SPEED:1000;SPEED (REMNANT):1600;SPEED (ALLIED HERO):0;DISTANCE:800;DISTANCE MULTIPLIER (REMNANT):2;DISTANCE MULTIPLIER (ALLIED HERO):0;DAMAGE:60/70/80/90;STUN DURATION:0.3/0.5/0.7/0.9;ROCK BONUS STUN DURATION:0.3/0.5/0.7/0.9;ALLIED HERO BONUS STUN DURATION:0/0/0/0;
lore: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.

name: GEOMAGNETIC GRIP
description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: REMNANT DAMAGE:70/140/210/280;SILENCE DURATION:2/2.5/3/3.5;HERO PULL SPEED:600;REMNANT PULL SPEED:900;
lore: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.

name: MAGNETIZE
description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
modifiers: RADIUS:350;DAMAGE PER SECOND:45/85/125;MAGNETIZE DURATION:6;REMNANT REFRESH/EXPLOSION RADIUS:600;BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE:0/0/0;
lore: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.

name: GEOMAGNETIC GRIP
description: Can now grab allies.

name: ENCHANT REMNANT
description:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
modifiers: REMNANT DURATION:2.4;SHATTER DAMAGE:450;SHATTER RADIUS:450;CAST RANGE ON ALLIES:500;
lore: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.

name: FISSURE
description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: FISSURE DURATION:6.5/7/7.5/8;STUN DURATION:0.8/1/1.2/1.4;DAMAGE:110/170/230/290;AFTERSHOCK STUN PCT:0%;FREE PATHING LINGER TIME:0;COOLDOWN:18/17/16/15;
lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.

name: ENCHANT TOTEM
description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 100 bonus attack range on the next attack.
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

name: ECHO SLAM
description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.
lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.

name: FISSURE
description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

name: ENCHANT TOTEM
description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there. Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.

name: ECHO STOMP
description: CHANNELED - Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations. The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.
info: ABILITY:No Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: The force of creation still echoes in the stomp of the Titan.

name: ASTRAL SPIRIT
description:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through. When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.
modifiers: RADIUS:275;DAMAGE:50;DURATION:10;BUFF DURATION:10;BONUS SPEED (CREEPS):1.5%;BONUS SPEED (HEROES):4%/5%/6%/7%;BONUS DAMAGE (CREEPS):3/7/11/15;BONUS DAMAGE (HEROES):17/38/59/80;BONUS ARMOR (CREEPS):0.5;BONUS ARMOR (HEROES):1.5/3/4.5/6;
lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.

name: EARTH SPLITTER
description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: IMPLODE DELAY:2.72;CRACK WIDTH:315;CRACK LENGTH:2400;MOVEMENT SLOW:30%/40%/50%;SLOW DURATION:3/4/5;MAX HP AS DAMAGE:34%/42%/50%;
lore: That which he created, the titan tears asunder.

name: ECHO STOMP
description: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on alt-cast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

name: ASTRAL SPIRIT
description: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for 2 seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.
lore: Like the four fundamentals, Elder Titan exists across all planes at once and can draw other aspects of himself to assist in times of need.

name: SEARING CHAINS
description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.
lore: Xin's harshest lessons often employed the use of red-hot chains.

name: SLEIGHT OF FIST
description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location. Deals bonus damage to heroes.
lore: The studied warrior must whip and weave through its enemies, burning each without pause.

name: FLAME GUARD
description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that consumes incoming magic damage, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken. Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active. If the shield is broken, the damage is also lost.
lore: An enemy should never be allowed to approach without difficulty.

name: ACTIVATE FIRE REMNANT
description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.
lore: With blazing speed does a spirit fly!

name: FIRE REMNANT
description: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250% Ember Spirit's speed. Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant. Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.
lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.

name: FIRE REMNANT
description: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.
lore: By the spirit's power are Xin's teachings spread anew.

name: IMPETUS
description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is. The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to illusions.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: While Aiushtha favors peaceful means, she is capable of a magical onslaught from a distance, her spears gaining energy from the natural life around her.

name: ENCHANT
description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are dispelled and slowed for 3.5s.

If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control and receives 40% of their experience bounty. Enchantress can control creeps for up to 30s.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
modifiers: HERO MOVE SLOW:-30%/-40%/-50%/-60%;ATTACK RANGE BONUS:0/0/0/0;CREEP MAX HEALTH BONUS:150/250/350/450;CREEP ATTACK DAMAGE BONUS:0/25/50/75;CREEP MAX LEVEL:4/5/6/6;MAX ENCHANTED CREEPS:1;CAST RANGE:500/550/600/650;
lore: A true steward of the forest, Aiushtha befriends all within it - from lowly trolls to powerful centaurs.

name: NATURE'S ATTENDANTS
description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.
lore: Whimsical spirits of the woods possess a healing power that is quite subtle, but gains strength in numbers.

name: SPROINK
description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 2 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 100.
lore: Sproink is as Sproink does.

name: LITTLE FRIENDS
description: Enchantress roots an enemy unit. All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack the chosen target for 6 seconds.
modifiers: BONUS ATTACK SPEED:100;BONUS MOVE SPEED:100%;RADIUS:1200;MINIMUM ROOT DURATION:2;ROOT DURATION PER UNIT:0.5;
lore: The laws of the forest may be oblique, but punishment for breaking them is swift and smiling.

name: MALEFICE
description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances. An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.

name: DEMONIC SUMMONING
description: Summons three fragments of Enigma himself at the cost of health. The eidolons health is increased by 3% of Enigma's current health. These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply. When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
modifiers: SPAWN COUNT:3;ATTACKS TO MULTIPLY:6;EIDOLON HP:180/200/220/240;EIDOLON DAMAGE:16/27/38/49;EIDOLON MAGIC RESISTANCE:30%/40%/50%/60%;EIDOLON ATTACK RANGE:425/450/475/500;DURATION:40;
lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.

name: MIDNIGHT PULSE
description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, dealing 5 + a percentage of the enemies current HP as damage.
lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.

name: BLACK HOLE
description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

name: MALEFICE
description: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.3s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

name: BLACK HOLE
description: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 4% of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.

name: TIME WALK
description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2 seconds.
lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

name: TIME DILATION
description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 7% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown.
modifiers: RADIUS:775;DURATION:8/9/10/11;SLOW PER COOLDOWN:7%/8%/9%/10%;COOLDOWN PROGRESSION SLOW:30%/40%/50%/60%;BONUS DPS PER COOLDOWN:7/9/11/13;
lore: For those facing off against Darkterror, each moment seems to stretch into eternity.

name: CHRONOSPHERE
description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected. Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.
lore: When a rift opens to Claszureme, all poor souls caught within will likely never return.

name: TIME ZONE
description: Creates a blister in spacetime, altering the movement, cast, projectile, cooldown, and turn rate speed of all units inside. Allies have increased speed and cooldown acceleration. Enemies have decreased speed, and have frozen ability and item cooldowns. Time Dilation does not tick down while inside.
modifiers: RADIUS:700;DURATION:3.75/4.25/4.75;ATTACK SPEED MANIPULATION:MOVEMENT SPEED MANIPULATION:;50%CAST SPEED MANIPULATION:;50%TURN SPEED MANIPULATION:;50%PROJECTILE SPEED MANIPULATION:;40%COOLDOWN ACCELERATION:;
lore: For the Acolytes of Clasz, stopping time is trivial, but manipulating the minutiae of its flow requires a mastery few have attained.

name: REVERSE TIME WALK
description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.
lore: It's all relative.

name: TIME WALK
description: Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.
lore: Darkterror tears a hole in time, passing through Claszureme, and appearing back in an instant.

name: STROKE OF FATE
description: Grimstroke paints a curved path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits. Applies Ink Trail on hit.
modifiers: BASE DAMAGE:100/160/220/280;BONUS DMG PER HERO:20/40/60/80;BONUS DMG PER ILLUSION/CREEP:10/20/30/40;MOVEMENT SLOW:50%/60%/70%/80%;SLOW DURATION:1.75;
lore: The corruptive force of Grimstroke's ink, drawn from the reservoir of his fallen people, consumes any enemy caught in its path.

name: PHANTOM'S EMBRACE
description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: LATCH DURATION:5;ATTACKS TO DESTROY:6/6/9/9;PHANTOM DPS:10/20/30/40;REND DAMAGE:120/200/280/360;
lore: Grimstroke holds no sorrow for the downfall of his people. Only for Yaovhi, she who was most dear to him, does he feel even a semblance of longing.

name: INK SWELL
description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3 seconds it applies damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Allies Yes Enemies No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: BUFF DURATION:3;MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS:20%;RADIUS:375;MAX DAMAGE:90/180/270/360;MAX STUN DURATION:1.6/2/2.4/2.8;INK TENDRILS DPS:30/45/60/75;MAX THRESHOLD DURATION:2.5;
