lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade. Facing MORE Terrorblades!

name: METAMORPHOSIS
description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.
modifiers: DURATION:35/40/45/50;TRANSFORMATION TIME:0.35;BASE ATTACK TIME:1.5;ATTACK RANGE:450/500/550/600;BONUS DAMAGE:20/40/60/80;ILLUSION AURA RADIUS:1200;
lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control. Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.

name: SUNDER
description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
lore: You didn't need that life, did you? The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.

name: DEMON ZEAL
description: Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, providing Terrorblade and nearby illusions bonus movement, HP Regen and attack speed. Reflection illusions gain 50% of the bonuses. Can't be cast while in Metamorphosis and Metamorphosis will remove Demon Zeal
modifiers: BONUS ATTACK SPEED:100;BONUS MOVEMENT SPEED:60;DURATION:30;BONUS HEALTH REGEN:20;CURRENT HEALTH COST:20%;
lore: Fear is fueled by confusion when Terrorblade's enemies see that the first cut he makes is one to embolden himself.

name: TERROR WAVE
description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact and dealing damage, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.
lore: A shockwave of power strong enough to break the walls of Foulfell itself.

name: GUSH
description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

name: KRAKEN SHELL
description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. Reduced block amount versus creeps.

Can be activated to double the block amount at the cost of 40% movement speed. Lasts 4s.
modifiers: DAMAGE BLOCK:15/35/55/75;DAMAGE BLOCK PER KILL:0/0/0/0;CREEP PENALTY:50%;
lore: Claddish navymen tell tales of a mighty sea-faring beast that suffered spear and sword but continued to lay waste to the fleet.

name: ANCHOR SMASH
description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
lore: Stolen from one of Admiral Kunkka's flagships, Leviathan's heavy anchor proves useful as a melee weapon.

name: RAVAGE
description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
info: ABILITY:No Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Calling to the abyssal god Maelrawn has resulted in entire armadas being lost at sea.

name: DEAD IN THE WATER
description: Tidehunter attaches a heavy anchor to an enemy hero. The hero is leashed while attached to the anchor. Attempting to move more than 350 units away from the anchor forces the hero to 100 move speed, dragging the anchor behind them. The anchor can be destroyed with 4 hero attacks.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: DAMAGE:100;ATTACKS TO DESTROY:4;ANCHOR DRAG SPEED:100;CHAIN LENGTH:350;ANCHOR DURATION:10;
lore: Anchors Aweigh!

name: GUSH
description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line. Decreases cooldown.
lore: During his championship of the Sunken Isles, Leviathan gained mastery over the open sea.

name: WHIRLING DEATH
description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area. If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration. Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.
modifiers: RADIUS:325;DAMAGE:85/130/175/220;TREE BONUS DAMAGE:11/18/25/32;STAT LOSS:13%;STAT LOSS (UNIVERSAL):5%;STAT LOSS DURATION:12/13/14/15;
lore: In the case that Rizzrack gets surrounded by the vines and plants of his nightmares, he has an immediate chainsaw defense.

name: TIMBER CHAIN
description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it. Any enemy in the path takes damage.
lore: You never know when you might need to escape from malevolent saplings.

name: CHAKRAM
description: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted. While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.
modifiers: RADIUS:200;PASS DAMAGE:100/150/200;DAMAGE PER SECOND:50/75/100;SLOW:5%;MANA COST PER SECOND:14/22/30;
lore: The ultimate in anti-flora weaponry.

name: TWISTED CHAKRAM
description: Launches a second independent Chakram that follows a curved path and returns to Timbersaw, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing.
lore: A happy little accident in the lab turned wild new weapon in the forest.

name: FLAMETHROWER
description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: DAMAGE PER SECOND:70;DURATION:8;WIDTH:275;RANGE:400;MOVE SLOW:30%;BUILDING DAMAGE:50%;DEBUFF LINGER TIME:2;
lore: A single saw can only cut so much. A single spark can burn forever.

name: LASER
description: Fires an intense energy beam, damaging and blinding the target. Blinded targets miss all physical attacks.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Pure;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

name: MARCH OF THE MACHINES
description: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.
lore: Even though the laboratory has since been sealed off, the ability to radio in robotic drones is still in working order.

name: DEFENSE MATRIX
description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.
lore: A gifted mind unconstrained by moral or ethical boundaries tends to attract an adversary or two.

name: REARM
description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on Tinker's abilities.
lore: A new battery here, another set of rockets there, Boush continually improves on existing technology.

name: WARP FLARE
description:
Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away, rooting them and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 2 seconds.

The teleport location is always the ability's current cast range + 100 from Tinker's position when he threw the flare.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Tinker's deadliest weapon instantly turns an enemy into space dust. Research to resolve the annoying 'perfect copy' side effect... is ongoing.

name: LASER
description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 13% (stacking). The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.
lore: Boush perfected this rock cutting laser in his subterranean laboratory, never considering its combat utility.

name: AVALANCHE
description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: Inanimate rock becomes animate when called by the Stone Giant.

name: TOSS
description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.
modifiers: RADIUS:275;DAMAGE:90/180/270/360;MOVEMENT SLOW:0%/0%/0%/0%;ATTACK SLOW:0/0/0/0;BONUS LANDING DAMAGE:0%;SLOW DURATION:0;
lore: Tiny's gargantuan stature allows him to catapult even the sturdiest of warriors.

name: TREE GRAB
description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.
modifiers: NUMBER OF ATTACKS:5;BONUS BASE DAMAGE:10/20/30/40;BONUS BUILDING DAMAGE:30%/40%/50%/60%;ATTACK RANGE:300;SPLASH DAMAGE:55%/70%/85%/100%;
lore: Sticks and stones break all the bones, with structures sure to follow.

name: TREE GRAB
description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

name: TREE VOLLEY
description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.
modifiers: TARGET RADIUS:400;TREE GRAB RADIUS:700;THROW INTERVAL:0.5;MAX CHANNEL TIME:2.5;
lore: Sticks thrown from stones are like to shatter many bones.

name: NATURE'S GRASP
description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.
lore: The tendrils of Rooftrellen's influence stretch to all corners of the forest.

name: LEECH SEED
description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it. Healing to creeps is reduced by 50%.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Rooftrellen nurtures the beings under his stewardship, sustained by the lifeforce of trespassers into his sacred ground.

name: LIVING ARMOR
description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Allied Units and Buildings;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: The roots and tendrils of the Treant Protectors are far-reaching, stimulating the growth and rejuvenation of all of nature.

name: OVERGROWTH
description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
lore: Rooftrellen calls the ancestral spirit of nature, releasing its power through all of his kin.

name: EYES IN THE FOREST
description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.
lore: One can never be too certain who, or what, might need protecting.

name: WHIRLING AXES (RANGED)
description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.

name: WHIRLING AXES (MELEE)
description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
lore: Keep your enemies close.

name: BATTLE TRANCE
description:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
modifiers: TRANCE DURATION:6.5;LIFESTEAL:40%/60%/80%;ATTACK SPEED:140/170/200;MOVEMENT SPEED:25%/30%/35%;BATTLE TRANCE MAX FERVOR STACKS:0;
lore: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.

name: WHIRLING AXES (RANGED)
description:
Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
lore: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.

name: ICE SHARDS
description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4 seconds.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: RADIUS:200;SHARD DAMAGE:75/150/225/300;SHARD DURATION:4/5/6/7;MOVE SLOW:0%;DAMAGE PER SECOND:0;SHARD DEPTH:0;
lore: In the frozen tundra near the Barrier, after the last sun of autumn has set, ice can form with alarming speed.

name: SNOWBALL
description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage and stun duration.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: BASE DAMAGE:80/140/200/260;SNOWBALL SPEED:575/600/625/650;BONUS DAMAGE PER ALLY:40/65/90/115;STUN DURATION:0.6/0.8/1/1.2;STUN DURATION PER ALLY:0.2;LAUNCH TIME:3;GATHER RADIUS:350;
lore: Tales are still told of the wild feat that ended the grand brawl at White Fields.

name: WALRUS PUNCH!
description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike with bonus damage so powerful it launches its victim into the air.
lore: It never matters who throws the first punch, only who throws the last.

name: TAG TEAM
description: Activate to temporarily apply a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 6 seconds.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: Even far from Cobalt, Tusk carries the 'Barrier Chill' in his very bones.

name: DRINKING BUDDIES
description: Tusk reaches out to tag an allied unit, pulling them closer. Once tagged, both Tusk and his tagged ally gain movement speed and attack damage. Can be put on alt-cast to only pull Tusk towards his ally with 50% reduced cast range.
lore: The only thing better than finding a good drinking buddy is finding an equally good enemy the two of you can punch.

name: ICE SHARDS
description: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

name: WALRUS KICK
description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50% if kicking a creep.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Tusk may have made his name with his fists, but the wise enemy is wary of any and all limbs.

name: FIRESTORM
description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
modifiers: RADIUS:425;WAVE COUNT:6;WAVE DAMAGE:30/50/70/90;WAVE INTERVAL:1;MAX HP BURN DAMAGE:1.5%/2%/2.5%/3%;BURN DURATION:2;WAVE COUNT BONUS:0;DURATION / INTERVAL REDUCTION:0%;
lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.

name: PIT OF MALICE
description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by the root only every 3.6 seconds.
lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.

name: FIEND'S GATE
description:
Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for 3.5 seconds to teleport to the other side. Portals have to be at least 1500 away from each other.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base, in front of your fountain.
lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.

name: FIRESTORM
description: Firestorm can be allied targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows the hero around. The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

name: PIT OF MALICE
description: Increases radius of the Pit of Malice.
lore: Twisting into the seams of reality itself, Vrogros' manifest hatred paralyzes those who defy his will.

name: DECAY
description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals 2x damage to creeps.
lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.

name: SOUL RIP
description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.
modifiers: DAMAGE/HEAL PER UNIT:14/26/38/50;MAX UNITS:10;RIP RADIUS:1300;TOMBSTONE HEAL:4/8/12/16;STRENGTH GAIN:0%;DURATION:0;
lore: Even allies feel despair in Undying's presence.

name: TOMBSTONE
description: Summons a tombstone at the target point. Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them. Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: ATTACKS TO DESTROY:5/6/7/8;TOMBSTONE DURATION:30;ZOMBIE SPAWN RADIUS:1200;DEATHLUST HEALTH THRESHOLD:40%;ZOMBIE SPAWN INTERVAL:4/3.6/3.2/2.8;ZOMBIE ATTACK DAMAGE:34;
lore: Dirge calls on his fallen brothers to fight for the Dead God.

name: FLESH GOLEM
description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.
modifiers: SLOW:30%/35%/40%;DAMAGE AMPLIFICATION:25%/30%/35%;SLOW DURATION:3;STRENGTH MULTIPLIER:40%/50%/60%;DURATION:40;BONUS MOVESPEED:20;ZOMBIE DURATION:0;
lore: The flesh of the recently dead add to the power of Dirge's plague.

name: TOMBSTONE
description: Tombstone can be cast on an allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for 2 seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving. If the tombstone is destroyed with a hero inside, that hero gets stunned for 2 seconds.

name: DECAY
description: Increases strength steal.
lore: The strength of the living is simply borrowed from the strength of the dead.

name: EARTHSHOCK
description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
lore: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.

name: OVERPOWER
description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed and slow resistance for a number of subsequent attacks.
lore: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.

name: ENRAGE
description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
modifiers: DAMAGE REDUCTION:80%;STATUS RESISTANCE:50%;DURATION:4/4.5/5;DAMAGE ABSORBED TO DAMAGE:0%;DAMAGE INCREASE LINGER DURATION:0;COOLDOWN:70/50/30;
lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

name: EARTHSHOCK
description: Earthshock applies a 1.3 second Enrage on Ursa when cast.

name: ENRAGE
description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
lore: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.

name: MAGIC MISSILE
description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
lore: A simple Skywrath technique, the magic missile is Shendel's primary tool for vengeance.

name: WAVE OF TERROR
description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the total attack damage and armor of enemies, and giving vision of the path ahead.
modifiers: DAMAGE:60/80/100/120;ARMOR REDUCTION:-3/-4/-5/-6;ATTACK DAMAGE REDUCTION:10%/15%/20%/25%;VISION DURATION:4;DEBUFF DURATION:8;
lore: Shendel's haunting voice hints at her approaching vindication.

name: NETHER SWAP
description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Vengeful Spirit and allied swapped units gain a barrier equal to the damage dealt.
lore: Martyrdom is a small price to pay for vengeance.

name: MAGIC MISSILE
description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within 75% of Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

name: VENOMOUS GALE
description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement. Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.
lore: A concoction of various stings, poisons, and toxins gathered from the jungles of Jidi Isle, victims surviving it are rare.

name: PLAGUE WARD
description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Allied Heroes;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: A mixture of his old herbalist talents and newfound toxic mastery creates a living embodiment of plague.

name: NOXIOUS PLAGUE
description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: DURATION:5;INITIAL DAMAGE:200/300/400;MAX HP AS DAMAGE:3%/4%/5%;DEBUFF RADIUS:800;MAX SLOW:50%;MIN SLOW:15%;PROJECTILE SPEED:1200;
lore: Deep in the heart of the jungles of Jidi, the seeds of extermination freely grow.

name: VENOMOUS GALE
description: If Venomous Gale is dispelled in any way, the target will receive 300 damage and be stunned for 1.6 seconds.

name: POISON ATTACK
description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 6 times.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
modifiers: DURATION:4;DAMAGE PER SECOND:4/8/12/16;MOVE SLOW:3%/6%/9%/12%;MAGIC RESISTANCE:4%/6%/8%/10%;MAX STACKS:6;ARMOR REDUCTION:0;BUILDING DAMAGE:0%;BONUS MAX STACKS:0;RADIUS:0;
lore: The Netherdrake's inborn toxic breath quickly drains the vitality of its afflicted.

name: NETHERTOXIN
description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Units in it have their attack speed slowed.
modifiers: MIN DPS:15/25/35/45;MAX DPS:35/65/95/125;MAX DPS DURATION:4;RADIUS:400;ATTACK SPEED SLOW:30/40/50/60;DURATION:6.5/7/7.5/8;
lore: Poison from the Nether Reaches turns wounds into fatalities, and fatigue into death.

name: VIPER STRIKE
description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also disabling their passives and dealing poison damage over time. The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:No;
lore: Once used to slay his sadistic summoner, the most powerful of Netherdrake infections spreads through the veins of those foolish enough to cross Viper.

name: POISON ATTACK
description: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

name: NOSEDIVE
description: Viper slams into the ground, releasing a Nethertoxin and splattering each enemy in a 500 AoE for 4 seconds with the effect of Corrosive Skin.
lore: It was thought that Netherdrake wings touch ground only in death, but some surmise that those who've witnessed more intentional landings merely haven't survived to tell the tale.

name: GRAVE CHILL
description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.
modifiers: DURATION:5;MOVE SPEED DRAIN:12%/16%/20%/24%;ATTACK SPEED DRAIN:25/40/55/70;AOE:0;SECONDARY TARGET PENALTY:0%;
lore: The warmth of the sun is never felt in the dark cold of the Narrow Maze.

name: SOUL ASSUMPTION
description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
modifiers: BASE DAMAGE:20;DAMAGE PER CHARGE:70;BONUS GOLD PER CHARGE PER KILL:0;CREEP GOLD:0%;MAX CHARGES:3/4/5/6;CHARGE DURATION:6;GATHER DAMAGE THRESHOLD:100;GATHER DAMAGE RADIUS:1800;
lore: The collected souls of the dead reach out to bring another into their fold.

name: SUMMON FAMILIARS
description: Conjures 2 blind Familiars to fight for Visage. Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing. While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health. Familiars grant high bounty when killed.
modifiers: FAMILIAR HEALTH:500/600/700;FAMILIAR ARMOR:2/3/4;FAMILIAR ATTACK RANGE:180;FAMILIAR SPEED:430;FAMILIAR GOLD BOUNTY:100;FAMILIAR ATTACK DAMAGE:25/50/75;
lore: Guardians of the Narrow Maze, Necro'lic's Familiars stand watch over his domain.

name: SILENT AS THE GRAVE
description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 30 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.
lore: Those on the mortal plane are blind to the stirrings of the agents of the afterlife.

name: AETHER REMNANT
description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Yes;
lore: Inai exists far beyond the scope of a single point in space and time.

name: DISSIMILATE
description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.
info: ABILITY:No Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: Inai much prefers to observe our plane free from the confines of corporeal form.

name: RESONANT PULSE
description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a protective shield that absorbs physical damage and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The shield gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.
modifiers: PULSE RADIUS:500;DAMAGE:60/110/160/210;BARRIER DURATION:10;BASE DAMAGE BARRIER:25/50/75/100;BARRIER AMOUNT PER HERO HIT:35/50/65/80;BASE CHARGE RESTORE TIME:0;SILENCE DURATION:0;
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.

name: ASTRAL STEP
description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.25 seconds and then detonates.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: A small step for Inai creates great devastation on the mortal plane.

name: AETHER REMNANT
description: Creates an additional watcher path that rotates around the remnant. The remnant now provides True Sight, and no longer triggers on creeps, instead dealing 50% damage to them every second in both paths.

name: RESONANT PULSE
description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain 2 charges.
lore: Inai never hesitates to shroud himself in the essence of his true self when forced to interact with the mortal plane.

name: FATAL BONDS
description: Binds several visible enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.
lore: An ancient incantation that links the vital energies of multiple lifeforms into one collective body.

name: SHADOW WORD
description: Warlock whispers an incantation, casting a spell on a unit that makes it deal damage to nearby enemy units and heal nearby ally units. Target Unit will also heal or be damaged depending on whether they are ally or enemy.
lore: Demnok's arcane arts have a myriad of uses, allowing them to be powerful friendly enchantments or damaging curses.

name: UPHEAVAL
description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 1 second after leaving the area or the spell ends.
modifiers: RADIUS:575/600/625/650;SLOW PER SECOND:11%/14%/17%/20%;MAX SLOW:55%/70%/85%/100%;DAMAGE PER SECOND:10;MAX DAMAGE:35/60/85/110;MAX CHANNEL DURATION:10/12/14/16;
lore: Demnok manipulates space-time, impairing entire armies.

name: CHAOTIC OFFERING
description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has increased Slow Resistance, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.
info: ABILITY:Point Target;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: SUMMON BLAST RADIUS:600;GOLEM HEALTH:1500/2250/3000;GOLEM DAMAGE:100/150/200;GOLEM MOVEMENT SPEED:320/340/360;GOLEM HEALTH REGEN:25/50/75;GOLEM GOLD BOUNTY:100/150/200;GOLEM ARMOR:8/12/14;GOLEM SLOW RESISTANCE:60%;HP/MANA REGEN TO BURN DAMAGE:0%;
lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

name: UPHEAVAL
description: While channeling, Warlock spawns a minor imp every 2 seconds that lasts for 15 seconds and explodes dealing damage to all enemies around them upon death.

name: CHAOTIC OFFERING
description: Calls 2 Golems.
lore: Demnok unleashes the captive spirit in his Dreadwood staff, causing destruction in enemy ranks.

name: THE SWARM
description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.
modifiers: ATTACK DAMAGE:18/22/26/30;ATTACK INTERVAL:1.2/1.05/0.9/0.75;COUNT:12;ARMOR REDUCTION PER ATTACK:1;DURATION:16;ATTACKS TO DESTROY:6/7/8/9;XP PER ATTACK:0/0/0/0;
lore: Skitskurr opens a gap in the space time fabric, allowing young Weavers to slip through and aid him in combat.

name: SHUKUCHI
description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.
lore: As the Weavers worked in the fabric of creation, small wormholes allowed them to slip through time to better work their craft.

name: GEMINATE ATTACK
description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units and Buildings;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;
lore: Skitskurr's relationship with time is somewhat variable, causing his actions to be witnessed - and felt - more than once.

name: TIME LAPSE
description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

name: SHUKUCHI
description: Shukuchi puts a mark on enemies it damages that last 4.6 seconds. 0.2s after Weaver exits Shukuchi, enemies with a mark within 1200 range will also be attacked with a secondary Geminate attack

name: TIME LAPSE
description: Time Lapse may target allied Heroes with 500 cast range.
lore: If Skitskurr does not deem the current reality of the world to fit his desires, he simply crawls back in time to right what was wronged.

name: SHACKLESHOT
description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it. If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Physical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: SHACKLE DURATION:1.75/2.25/2.75/3.25;BONUS DAMAGE PER HERO:0;CREEP/TREE DAMAGE:0%;DAMAGE BUFF DURATION:0/0/0/0;
lore: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.

name: POWERSHOT
description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages and slows enemies' movement speed along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage and slow is reduced.
modifiers: DAMAGE:170/270/370/470;SLOW:20%/25%/30%/35%;SLOW DURATION:4;REDUCTION PER UNIT:15%;RANGE:3000;MIN EXECUTE THRESHOLD:0%;MAX EXECUTE THRESHOLD:0%/0%/0%/0%;
lore: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets.

name: WINDRUN
description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks.
lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

name: FOCUS FIRE
description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 350 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage. Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units and Buildings;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:Yes;DISPELLABLE:No;
modifiers: BONUS ATTACK SPEED:350/425/500;ATTACKS PER SECOND:0/0/0;DAMAGE REDUCTION:-25%;BONUS ATTACK RANGE:0;DURATION:20;
lore: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.

name: GALE FORCE
description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.
lore: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.

name: WINDRUN
description: Windrun reduces physical damage taken by 45%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.
lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.

name: ARCTIC BURN
description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 4% of their current health each second.
modifiers: FLIGHT DURATION:7/8/9/10;BONUS ATTACK RANGE:275/300/325/350;HEALTH BURN:4%/6%/8%/10%;BURN DURATION:5;MOVEMENT SLOW:16%/24%/32%/40%;MANA PER SECOND:0;MOVEMENT SPEED:0%;
lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.

name: SPLINTER BLAST
description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward a unit. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 28%.
lore: Produced slowly by specialized vesicles in her frozen gullet, Winter Wyvern blast shards of ice at her enemies.

name: COLD EMBRACE
description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.
modifiers: DURATION:4;BASE HEAL PER SECOND:40/45/50/55;MAX HP HEAL PER SECOND:2.25%/3%/3.75%/4.5%;BONUS ATTACK DAMAGE:0%;DAMAGE BUFF DURATION:0;
lore: From winter's heart comes a cold, healing embrace. The ice slows the blood and allows the spell to better work its curative magic.

name: WINTER'S CURSE
description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of damage from Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.
modifiers: CURSE RADIUS:525;CURSE DAMAGE REDUCTION:100%;CURSE ATTACK SPEED:65;CURSE MINIMUM DURATION:2;CURSE MAXIMUM DURATION:4/5.5/7;CURSE BONUS DURATION PER HERO:2;CURSE BONUS DURATION PER CREEP:0.5;
lore: The oldest of the bookwurm's spells, this curse lends truth to the old saw: sometimes the enemy of my enemy is my enemy still.

name: COLD EMBRACE
description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1150 range. Reduces cooldown by 4 seconds.

name: ARCTIC BURN
description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.
lore: The same organ where some dragons stoke their inner flame is, in Auroth, a crucible of unimaginable cold. From deep within her frosty gullet, an exhalation sends enemies into burning agony.

name: PARALYZING CASK
description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Damage increases each bounce.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: STUN DURATION:0.8;BASE DAMAGE:55/70/85/100;BOUNCES:3/4/5/6;BONUS DAMAGE PER BOUNCE:20;
lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.

name: VOODOO RESTORATION
description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.
lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.

name: MALEDICT
description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.
lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.

name: DEATH WARD
description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds. Death Ward has 50% bonus accuracy.
lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

name: VOODOO SWITCHEROO
description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

name: DEATH WARD
description: Death Ward attacks bounce between nearby enemies.
lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.

name: WRAITHFIRE BLAST
description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;DISPELLABLE:Only Strong Dispels;
modifiers: STUN DURATION:1/1.2/1.4/1.6;SLOW DURATION:2;MOVEMENT SLOW:-20%;IMPACT DAMAGE:75/90/105/120;DAMAGE PER SECOND:20/40/60/80;
lore: Ostarion calls on his damned lineage, laying waste to his opponents.

name: MORTAL STRIKE
description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.
lore: One blow to crush a foe.

name: REINCARNATION
description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle. Upon death, enemy units in a 600 radius are slowed. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.
modifiers: REINCARNATION TIME:3;MOVEMENT SLOW:-75%;ATTACK SPEED SLOW:-75;SLOW DURATION:4;COOLDOWN:180/150/120;
lore: Conspirators against the Wraith King wonder why he never stays dead.

name: BONE GUARD
description: Gains a Charge for every 2 creeps killed and 2 charges per hero killed. Activate to spend all charges, summoning skeletons that respawn once when killed. Skeletons benefit from Vampiric Spirit's lifesteal.
modifiers: SKELETON DURATION:46;MAX CHARGES:2/4/6/8;SKELETON DAMAGE:34/39/43/49;SKELETON BUILDING DAMAGE REDUCTION:35%;SKELETON HERO BONUS DAMAGE:25%;
lore: Wraith King's blade drains his enemy's essence to feed his aura.

name: MORTAL STRIKE
description: Mortal Strike deals 50% bonus damage when in Wraith form.

name: ARC LIGHTNING
description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal damage.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

name: LIGHTNING BOLT
description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 500 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
info: ABILITY:Unit Target;AFFECTS:Enemy Units;DAMAGE TYPE:Magical;PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY:No;
lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

name: HEAVENLY JUMP
description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.
modifiers: DAMAGE:25/50/75/100;LEAP DISTANCE:375/450/525/600;SHOCK RANGE:700/800/900/1000;VISION RADIUS:900;DURATION:1.4;MOVE SPEED SLOW:80%;ATTACK SPEED SLOW:100;TARGETS:1;
lore: Though temporarily barred from the heavens, Zeus can still manage a measure of godly flight.

name: THUNDERGOD'S WRATH
description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
modifiers: TRUE SIGHT RADIUS:500;DURATION:3;DAMAGE:300/475/650;DELAY BETWEEN BOLTS:0;AMPLIFICATION PER KILL:0%;
lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

name: NIMBUS
description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
modifiers: DURATION:30;LIGHTNING BOLT BASE COOLDOWN:2.5;RADIUS:450;HITS TO DESTROY:8;CREEP HITS TO DESTROY:16;
lore: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.
